about_the_game:
Eternal Tabletop is the next generation of virtual tabletop applications - a software tool that allows you to play your favorite miniature wargames and tabletop role-playing games. It is an easy-to-use, customizable, and immersive virtual environment.

You can use our app to improve your in-person gaming experience or connect with your friends from all over the world to play online.

GAMEPLAY


As a Game Master, you are in full control of the experience! Create stunning maps; import custom buildings and props; control the mood with soundscapes, music and environmental effects. Invite your friends and together tell the tales of adventure, war and audacity!

When joining a game as a player you will be given control of a heroic character or maybe a whole army baddies?! That all depends on what kind of game YOU and your friends wish to play.

Roll the dice and see what the fate has in stoke for you and your units! The dice rolls are physically simulated and can be customized to output the total result, the number of successes, or simply give you the list of individual results!

CUSTOMIZATION


We are putting together a modular rules system that will support a large number of different RPG and Wargaming rulesets. If it has dice and miniatures - you can make it even better with Eternal Tabletop!

You will also have options to import miniature models various formats as well as change the colors and textures of your miniatures. You can even have multiple miniatures per character for all your shapeshifting needs!

Dice models are fully customizable including modifiers, dropping the highest/lowest, exploding dice (acing) and much more! You can also load in custom dice sets to implement specific game mechanics (FUDGE/FATE, SW:EOTE); exotic dice such as D3, D7; or to simply add a bit of extra flare.

Share what you create: maps, buildings, characters and more!

Come join our growing community on Discord!

Our mission is to bring your virtual tabletop gaming experience to the next level by offering unmatched customization options in an easy to use software kit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
